sourceText: ClickHEREfor useful resources and support if you are experiencing violence at home
text: ChofozaLAPHAukuze uthole izinsiza nosizo uma uhlangabezana nodlame ekhaya

sourceText: When we model peaceful and loving relationships, our children feel more secure and loved.
text: Uma siveza ubudlelwano obunokuthula nobunothando, izingane zethu zizizwa zivikelekile futhi zithandwa kakhudlwana.

sourceText: Positive language, active listening, and empathy help maintain a peaceful and happy family environment under stressful times.
text: Ulimi olwakhayo, ukulalelisisa, kanye nozwela kusiza ukugcina ukuthula nenjabulo esimweni somndeni ngezikhathi ezinzima.

sourceText: Use positive language. It works!
text: Sebenzisa ulimi olwakhayo! Luyasebenza!

sourceText: Tell others what you want them to do instead of what you don’t want them to do: Instead of “Stop shouting,” try “Please speak more quietly”.
text: Tshela abanye ukuthi ufuna benzeni kunokuba ubatshele lokho ongafuni bakwenze: Esikhundleni sokuthi "Yeka ukumemeza," zama ukuthi "Ngicela ukhulumele phansi."

sourceText: Praise others to make them feel appreciated and good about themselves. Simple words like, “Thank you for clearing the dinner,” or “Thank you for watching the baby” can make a big difference.
text: Ncoma abanye ukuze ubenze bazizwe bethokozelwa futhi bazizwe kahle ngabo ngokwabo. Amagama alula afana nokuthi, "Ngiyabonga ngokuqoqa ngemva kwesidlo sasebusuku," noma "Ngiyabonga ngokugada ingane" angenza umehluko omkhulu.

sourceText: Share the load.
text: Yabelana ngomthwalo.

sourceText: Looking after children and other family members is difficult, but it’s much easier when responsibilities are shared.
text: Ukunakekela abantwana kanye namanye amalungu omndeni kunzima, kodwa kuba lula uma imisebenzi ihlanganyelwa.

sourceText: Try to share household chores, childcare, and other tasks equally amongst family members.
text: Zamani ukwaba imisebenzi yasekhaya, ukunakekela izingane, kanye neminye imisebenzi ngokulinganayo phakathi kwamalungu omndeni.

sourceText: Create a schedule for time “on” and time “off” with other adults in your household.
text: Yakha isimiso sesikhathi "sokungena" nesikhathi "sokuphuma" nabanye abantu abadala ekhaya lakho.

sourceText: It is okay to ask for help when you are feeling tired or stressed so that you can take a break.
text: Kulungile ukucela usizo uma uzizwa ukhathele noma ucindezelekile ukuze uthathe ikhefu.

sourceText: Feeling stressed or angry?Give yourself a 10-second pause. Breathe in and out slowly five times. Then try to respond in a calmer way. Millions of parents say this helps - A LOT.Decide to take a break from arguing when you see arguments building up, and go into another room or outside if you can.See Tip Sheets on “When We Get Angry” and “Keep Calm and Manage Stress”.
text: Uzizwa ucindezelekile noma uthukuthele?Zinike ikhefu lemizuzwana engu-10. Donsa umoya bese uyawukhipha kancane kahlanu. Bese uzama ukuphendula ngendlela ezolile. Izigidi zabazali zithi lokhu kuyasiza - KAKHULU.Khetha ukuthatha ikhefu ezingxabanweni uma ubona izingxabano zakheka, bese uya kwelinye igumbi noma phandle uma ukwazi.Bheka Iphepha Lamacebiso ku- “Lapho Sithukuthela” kanye ne- “Zola futhi Ulawule Ukucindezeleka”.

sourceText: Nice things to do together as a family.
text: Izinto ezinhle eningazenza ndawonye njengomndeni.

sourceText: Let each family member take turns choosing a whole family activity each day.
text: Ilungu ngalinye lomndeni malishintshane ngokukhetha umsebenzi womndeni wonke usuku ngalunye.

sourceText: Find ways to spend quality time alone with your partner and other adults in your home, too!
text: Thola izindlela zokuchitha isikhathi esizuzisayo nophathina wakho nabanye abantu abadala emndenini wakho, futhi!

sourceText: Be an empathetic active listener.
text: Yiba yisislaleli esilalelisayo esinozwela.

sourceText: Listen to others when they are talking with you.
text: Lalela abanye uma bekhuluma nawe.

sourceText: Be open and show them that you hear what they are saying.
text: Vuleleka futhi ubabonise ukuthi uyakuzwa abakushoyo.

sourceText: It can help to summarise what you have heard before responding: “What I hear you saying is…”.
text: Kungasiza ukufingqa okuzwile ngaphambi kokuba uphendule: "Engikuzwa ukusho ukuthi...".

sourceText: For more information click below links:
text: Ukuthola imininingwane eyengeziwe chofoza izixhumanisi ezingezansi:

sourceText: We are models for our kids.
text: Siyizibonelo ezinganeni zethu.

sourceText: How we talk and behave in front of our children is a big influence on how they behave too!
text: Indlela esikhuluma nesiziphatha ngayo phambi kwezingane zethu inomthelela omkhulu endleleni abaziphatha ngayo nabo!

sourceText: Try to talk kindly to everyone in the family, adults and children.
text: Zama ukukhuluma ngomusa kuwo wonke umuntu emndenini, abantu abadala kanye nezingane.

sourceText: Bad communication between adults in the household can have a negative impact on our children.
text: Ukukhulumisana okongalungile phakathi kwabantu abadala ekhaya kungaba nomthelela omubi ezinganeni zethu.

sourceText: The more we practice modeling peaceful, loving relationships for our children, the more secure and loved they will feel.
text: Uma sizijwayeza ngokwengeziwe ukubonisa ubudlelwano obunokuthula, nothando ezinganeni zethu, ziyozizwa zivikeleke kakhulu futhi zithandwa.

sourceText: Family Harmony at Home
text: Ukuvumelana Komndeni Ekhaya
